title: Home

content:
Welcome to Tea House. This blog is designed to be a peaceful sanctuary blending the philosophy of tranquility with the world of technology.
Why Tea House? # Tea is not just a drink; it’s a ritual of meditation. Here we will discuss:
Web development with Hugo. UX Design. Philosophical and technical ideas. “Beauty lies in the simple details.”
